article: thailand 's tourism sector , which has barely begun to recover from december 's disastrous indian ocean tsunami , should be able to cope with the fresh problems posed by the massive earthquake that shook southeast asia this week , travel industry executives said .
abstract: shaken thai travel industry believes tourism will recover despite latest asian quake
